decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): Existing Location WV G: E D: 001A, Existing Location Plan WV G: E LP: 002C, Existing Site Location Plan WV G: E SP: 003A, Existing Site Plan WV G: E S P: 004A, Existing Plans WV G: E P & R P: 005C, Existing Front and Rear Elevations WV G: E F & R E: 006C, Existing Side Elevations WV G: E S & S E: 007C, Existing Sections WV G: E F & S S: 008D, Existing Axonometric WV G: E E A: 009A, Proposed Site Plan WV G: P SP: 010F, Proposed Plans WV G: P P & R P: 011G, Proposed Front and Rear Elevations WV G: P F & R E: 012H, Proposed Side Elevations WV G: P S & S E: 013G, Proposed Sections WV G: P F & S S: 014I, Proposed Axonometric WV G: P E A: 015E.
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| The hereby approved rooflight to the front roof slope shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Rear roof extension with Juliet Balcony; insertion of two rooflights to front roof slope
